xxl.connectivity.colt
Class RandomElementReservoirSampler

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.cursors.AbstractCursor<A>
      xxl.core.cursors.mappers.Aggregator
          xxl.core.cursors.mappers.ReservoirSampler
              xxl.connectivity.colt.RandomElementReservoirSampler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterator, Cursor
public class RandomElementReservoirSampler
extends ReservoirSampler

This class provide a sampling algorithm based upon the reservoir sampling algorithm using a given PRNG shipped with the colt library.
There are three types of strategies available based on [Vit85]: Jeffrey Scott Vitter, Random Sampling with a Reservoir, in ACM Transactions on Mathematical Software, Vol. 11, NO. 1, March 1985, Pages 37-57. For further details see ReservoirSample and ReservoirSampler.

See Also:
ReservoirSample, ReservoirSampler, Aggregator, Cursor

Constructor Detail

RandomElementReservoirSampler

public RandomElementReservoirSampler(Iterator input,
                                     int n,
                                     int type,
                                     RandomElement randomGenerator)
                              throws IllegalArgumentException
Constructs a new aggregator that provides a reservoir sampling as output.

Parameters:
input - iterator to draw the sample from
n - size of the sample to draw
type - strategy used for determining the position of the treated object in the sampling reservoir
randomGenerator - used PRNG shipped with colt for the random wrappers
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if an unknown sampling strategy is given

RandomElementReservoirSampler

public RandomElementReservoirSampler(Iterator input,
                                     int n,
                                     int type)
                              throws IllegalArgumentException
Constructs a new aggregator that provides a reservoir sampling as output using the Mersenne Twister as PRNG.

Parameters:
input - iterator to draw the sample from
n - size of the sample to draw
type - strategy used for determining the position of the treated object in the sampling reservoir
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if an unknown sampling strategy is given
